verses.verse: But now<WH6258> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> that created<WH1254> you, O Jacob,<WH3290> and he that formed<WH3335> you, O Israel,<WH3478> Fear<WH3372> not: for I have redeemed<WH1350> you, I have called<WH7121> you by your name;<WH8034> you are mine.

When<WH3588> you pass<WH5674> through the waters,<WH4325> I will be with you; and through the rivers,<WH5103> they shall not overflow<WH7857> you: when<WH3588> you walk<WH3212> through<WH1119> the fire,<WH784> you shall not be burned;<WH3554> neither<WH3808> shall the flame<WH3852> kindle<WH1197> on you.

For I am the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> the Holy<WH6918> One of Israel,<WH3478> your Savior:<WH3467> I gave<WH5414> Egypt<WH4714> for your ransom,<WH3724> Ethiopia<WH3568> and Seba<WH5434> for you.

Since you were precious<WH3365> in my sight,<WH5869> you have been honorable,<WH3513> and I have loved<WH157> you: therefore will I give<WH5414> men<WH120> for you, and people<WH3816> for your life.<WH5315>
Fear<WH3372> not: for I am with you: I will bring<WH935> your seed<WH2233> from the east,<WH4217> and gather<WH6908> you from the west;<WH4628>

I will say<WH559> to the north,<WH6828> Give<WH5414> up; and to the south,<WH8486> Keep<WH3607> not back:<WH3607> bring<WH935> my sons<WH1121> from far,<WH7350> and my daughters<WH1323> from the ends<WH7097> of the earth;<WH776>
Even every<WH3605> one that is called<WH7121> by my name:<WH8034> for I have created<WH1254> him for my glory,<WH3519> I have formed<WH3335> him; yes,<WH637> I have made<WH6213> him.
Bring<WH3318> forth<WH3318> the blind<WH5787> people<WH5971> that have<WH3426> eyes,<WH5869> and the deaf<WH2795> that have ears.<WH241>

Let all<WH3605> the nations<WH1471> be gathered<WH6908> together,<WH3162> and let the people<WH3816> be assembled:<WH622> who<WH4310> among them can declare<WH5046> this,<WH2063> and show<WH8085> us former<WH7223> things? let them bring<WH5414> forth their witnesses,<WH5707> that they may be justified:<WH6663> or let them hear,<WH8085> and say,<WH559> It is truth.<WH571>

You are my witnesses,<WH5707> said<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> and my servant<WH5650> whom<WH834> I have chosen:<WH977> that you may know<WH3045> and believe<WH539> me, and understand<WH995> that I am he: before<WH6440> me there was no<WH3808> God<WH410> formed,<WH3335> neither<WH3808> shall there be after<WH310> me.
I, even I, am the LORD;<WH3068> and beside<WH1107> me there is no<WH369> savior.<WH3467>

I have declared,<WH5046> and have saved,<WH3467> and I have showed,<WH8085> when there was no<WH369> strange<WH2114> god among you: therefore you are my witnesses,<WH5707> said<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> that I am God.<WH410>
Yes,<WH1571> before the day<WH3117> was I am he; and there is none<WH369> that can deliver<WH5337> out of my hand:<WH3027> I will work,<WH6466> and who<WH4310> shall let<WH7725> it?

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> your redeemer,<WH1350> the Holy<WH6918> One of Israel;<WH3478> For your sake<WH4616> I have sent<WH7971> to Babylon,<WH894> and have brought<WH3381> down<WH3381> all<WH3605> their nobles,<WH1281> and the Chaldeans,<WH3778> whose cry<WH7440> is in the ships.<WH591>
I am the LORD,<WH3068> your Holy<WH6918> One, the creator<WH1254> of Israel,<WH3478> your King.<WH4428>
Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> which makes<WH5414> a way<WH1870> in the sea,<WH3220> and a path<WH5410> in the mighty<WH5794> waters;<WH4325>

Which brings<WH3318> forth<WH4161> the chariot<WH7393> and horse,<WH5483> the army<WH2428> and the power;<WH5808> they shall lie<WH7901> down<WH3381> together,<WH3162> they shall not rise:<WH6965> they are extinct,<WH1846> they are quenched<WH3518> as wick.<WH6594>
Remember<WH2142> you not the former<WH7223> things, neither<WH408> consider<WH995> the things of old.<WH6931>

Behold,<WH2005> I will do<WH6213> a new<WH2319> thing; now<WH6258> it shall spring<WH6779> forth;<WH6779> shall you not know<WH3045> it? I will even<WH637> make<WH7760> a way<WH1870> in the wilderness,<WH4057> and rivers<WH5103> in the desert.<WH3452>

The beast<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> shall honor<WH3513> me, the dragons<WH8577> and the owls:<WH1323> <WH3284> because<WH3588> I give<WH5414> waters<WH4325> in the wilderness,<WH4057> and rivers<WH5103> in the desert,<WH3452> to give drink<WH8248> to my people,<WH5971> my chosen.<WH972>
This<WH2098> people<WH5971> have I formed<WH3335> for myself; they shall show<WH5608> forth my praise.<WH8416>
But you have not called<WH7121> on me, O Jacob;<WH3290> but you have been weary<WH3021> of me, O Israel.<WH3478>

You have not brought<WH935> me the small cattle<WH7716> of your burnt<WH5930> offerings; neither<WH3808> have you honored<WH3513> me with your sacrifices.<WH2077> I have not caused you to serve<WH5647> with an offering,<WH4503> nor<WH3808> wearied<WH3021> you with incense.<WH3828>

You have bought<WH7069> me no<WH3808> sweet cane<WH7070> with money,<WH3701> neither<WH3808> have you filled<WH7301> me with the fat<WH2459> of your sacrifices:<WH2077> but you have made<WH6213> me to serve<WH5647> with your sins,<WH2403> you have wearied<WH3021> me with your iniquities.<WH5771>
I, even I, am he that blots<WH4229> out your transgressions<WH6588> for my own sake,<WH4616> and will not remember<WH2142> your sins.<WH2403>
Put me in remembrance:<WH2142> let us plead<WH8199> together:<WH3162> declare<WH5608> you, that you may be justified.<WH6663>
Your first<WH7223> father<WH1> has sinned,<WH2398> and your teachers<WH3887> have transgressed<WH6586> against me.
Therefore I have profaned<WH2490> the princes<WH8269> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> and have given<WH5414> Jacob<WH3290> to the curse,<WH2764> and Israel<WH3478> to reproaches.<WH1421>
